attributes.additional_details:
We the people believe that Rod Stewart should be knighted for his outstanding contribution to Music and charitable foundations.

Rod Stewart has supported the following charities:

Andre Agassi Foundation for Education
Barbara Davis Center for Childhood Diabetes
Caudwell Children
Dream FoundationElton John AIDS Foundation
Hear The World
HillsidesLowe Syndrome
TrustMusiCaresRed
CrossStarkey Hearing Foundation
STOMP Out Bullying

Causes supported
Abuse, AIDS & HIV, At-Risk/Disadvantaged Youths, Children, Creative Arts, Disaster Relief, Education, Family/Parent Support, Health, Human Rights, Rape/Sexual Abuse, Unemployment/Career Support
